Optimize Virtualization With Pure Storage & VMTurbo <http://vmturbo.com/pure-storage-webinar?utm_source=vmturbo&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=purestorage&utm_content=022415> Attend this exclusive webinar from Pure Storage <http://purestorage.com?utm_source=vmturbo&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=purestorage&utm_content=022415> and VMTurbo to learn about the brand new Pure Storage Control Module. Pure’s FlashArray is the world’s first all-flash storage array for the enterprise. Featuring best in breed data reduction (FlashReduce), protection (FlashProtect), recovery (FlashRecover), and IOPS 10x the capacity of spinning disk, FlashArray is purpose-built for enterprise scale virtualization, VDI, and databasing. VMTurbo’s Pure Storage Control Module extends control through the virtual datastore and into the volumes of your Pure FlashArray, enabling you to:
- Maximize the value of your Pure Storage investment through proper sizing, placement, and configuration decisions both upstream and downstream of your Pure controllers - Manage heterogeneous flash/legacy storage environments by identifying which workloads require flash and when - Plan for the future to onboard additional FlashArrays with a priori insight of the all-flash impact on performance and efficiency
Join the Revolution, and learn about this exciting new solution Tomorrow!
